name: ArmaGombie
description:
Little university project to learn basic AI programming, the unity NavMesh and NavMesh Agent, LOD's, Occlusion Culling, Terrain Tools and  Light Mapping.

Gameplay (during the development and before appling Lightmapping):

Models by

 Polygon BlackSmith :

 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/toony-tiny-people-demo-11318...

SuperCyan: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/environment-pack-free-forest...

Viuletti: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/low-poly-city-from-v...

Marcelo Barrio: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/toony-tiny-city-demo...

Controls: 

You have to reach the goal highlighted with some yellow star particles (the white ones only show you the way).

WASD to move the Policeman.

Left Click to shoot the gun and kill the zombies.
